beer.beer_description: Passchendaele Blond surprises with light spiciness and subtle maltiness in the flavor. This beer is a typical strong blonde beer of high fermentation with low alcohol content and is therefore similar to a pils of low fermentation. This beer is brewed in memory of the victims of the Battle of Passchendaele 1917.

items.checkin_comment: Fruitig biertje op het Friedhof. Mocht iets kouder, maar er werden homoen hesp en Kees bij geserveerd.

items.badge_name: Cheers to Independent U.S. Craft Breweries (Level 5)
items.badge_description: Cheers, beer patriot! You are supporting the small and independent American craft brewer. When you see the seal -- shaped like an upside-down beer bottle -- that's independence you're tasting. Try 5 more to earn Level 6!

Sometimes you need a break from all the hops, fruits, and spices. What better way than with a crisp, smooth Blonde Ale or Golden Ale? Basic but delicious. That's 360 different beers with the style of Blonde Ale or Golden Ale. Try 5 more for Level 73!

Hiking, fishing, swimming - there are so many wonderful things to do while you enjoy the great outdoors. Even beer is better when surrounded by the beauty of nature. That's 50 different venues categorized as Great Outdoors. Visit 5 more for Level 11!
